Posts.Content: Congratulations on your free from cancer report. Your increasing PSA number, while relatively low, is to be watched. I would not wait over 60 days to get another PSA number as I understand yours has doubled in 6 months. From my perspective, a MRI is not that big of a big deal on the patient / procedure side of the equation. It does not hurt. You lie quietly for about 45 minutes in a chamber and they inject you with a contrast die. He may have been referring to an availability of equipment issue or cost factor.
Posts.Title: Biopsy clear despite high PSA?
